name: app
description: A minimal client/server to interact with a GraphQL API

scripts.initDb: if  ls -1qA $PWD/server/data | grep -q .; then pg_ctl -D $PWD/server/data start; else pg_ctl -D $PWD/server/data initdb; pg_ctl -D $PWD/server/data start; createdb; fi
scripts.dev: trap "echo Shutting down database " SIGINT; concurrently "NODE_ENV=development webpack serve --open" "NODE_ENV=development nodemon --experimental-specifier-resolution=node server/server.js"
